commands.command: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS id, fk_pivot_table, name, CONCAT('/admin/statuses/add-edit.html?id=', id) AS url FROM status WHERE 1=1 AND( IF(LENGTH('#is_active#') = 0, 1=1, is_active = '#is_active#') ) AND( IF(LENGTH('#fk_pivot_table#') = 0, 1=1, fk_pivot_table = '#fk_pivot_table#') ) ORDER BY fk_pivot_table, name LIMIT #_limit_#
